contents.narration: Here we are.  This is a typical, two-bedroom ranch-style home nestled in the heart of surburbia.  You need to get in there, determine the type of entity we are dealing with, and collect evidence so that the sweepers know what they are dealing with when they arrive to do their thing. Figure out its type, age, and temperment and get a picture of it and you'll be done in no time.  Now, let us enter.

This is the foyer. It is littered with the trappings of family life; kid shoes, umbrellas in a large tin, and a small desk with bills, keys, and a few photos strewn upon it. The living room is ahead and the kitchen is to the left.

parameters.message: The foyer. Kitchen left, living room ahead.

utterances: let's go to the living room

contents.narration: The living room is a bit array, as if the family left in a bit of a hurry.  Unfolded clothes sit upon the couch and a half-eaten hamburger was left on the coffee table.  There is an obligatory television in this room and a fireplace that has seen little use.  There is a sliding glass door to the patio ahead and a bathroom to the right.  The stairs to the second floor are next to the bathroom.  You can go backwards to the foyer.

parameters.message: The living room. The foyer behind, patio ahead, bathroom to the right.  You can also take the stairs.

contents.narration: You press the button and the TV crackles to life.  There is nothing on the channel, just fizzing snow and the low hum of white noise.

contents.narration:
And that's all she wrote.
        ||
        Not much there but keep at it.
The tesla coil sang a drew forth the entity.  This is usually only effective on spirits and the accursed.
Heat signatures were visible on the IR meter.  This could mean we are dealing with an apparition, demon, or spectre.
The entity reacted to the torch, meaning it is likely a demon, shadow, or accursed.
You were able to banish the entity.  Generally, only spectres and shadows can be banished.
The strong electromagnetic frequencies were detected from the entity, common amongst apparitions and spectres.
Voices were detected on the spirit box or through some other noise generator, indicative of an apparition, spirit, or accursed.
The entity is susceptible to binding, a sign of a shadow, spirit, or demon.
It seems your storied career and life have both come to an end. Pity, I was sort of getting used to you.  Farewell.
You did not select that item.
You consult the EMF meter.

It is right on top of us.
    ||
    It's right here.

It is close.
    ||
    The meter indicates its close.

The meter is not picking up any readings.
    ||
    EMF detector is negative.
You listen in on the spirit box.

The voice is dangerously close.
    ||
    It sounds like it is next to you.

The voice is faint but near.
    ||
    It sounds like the voice is fairly close.

You hear nothing but static
    ||
    The scan does not produce any results.
You perform the ritual of binding
The ritual is a success! You can see the {type} before you as it writhes in the metaphysical prison.  It won't hold forver.

You hear the spell attempt to bind the entity somewhere near.
    ||
    The entity is too far away to bind.

Apparently, the entity cannot be bound.
    ||
    The entity is not affected by the spell.
You perform the ritual of banishment.
The ritual is a success! You see the {type} dissipate in confusion before you.  It is gone for now but will return shortly.

You hear the entity struggle but ultimately avoid the banishment.
    ||
    From afar you hear the spell fail to banish the entity.

Apparently, the entity cannot be banished.
    ||
    The entity is not affected by the spell.
You swing the lit torch.

The torch flame stuns the entity.
    ||
    The torch illuminates the entity.

The torch lights the area but the entity slips away.
    ||
    The light from the torch causes the entity to shift.

The torch does not seem to react to the entity.
    ||
    The entity is not affected by the torch.

You hear a sound through the static. The voice is dangerously close.
    ||
    It sounds like something is speaking through the television.  It is right here!

A voice is faint but apparent from within the static.
    ||
    A voice manifests in the static and it sounds near.
The button seems to be broken as the TV turns off on its own.
Welcome to the house. Please state your name for the record.

{playerName}, I see.  I would welcome you but there is not much time and, well frankly, you are most likely not welcome.  This house is haunted and none other than the great Spirit Hunter {playerName} shall vanquish the accursed from the halls of this home.  Listen carefully, follow the clues, and use your equipment wisely and you may make it out alive. Shall we begin?

Who am I?  Why, I am an angel; I am a cricket; I am a dandelion wish from upon high; here to see that you succeed at your task despite your shortcomings and fragile knowlede of what truly lies beyond.  I am the headmaster and the conductor; I am the only way you will survive the night.  With that said . . .

You should equipped yourself with some of the latest in ghost hunting technology and mytsical spells.  You may carry three items.  You can choose from an EMF detector, spirit box, infrared detector, binding ritual, banishment ritual, torch, and a tesla coil.  I you would like more information on these items, simply ask for help. So then, what is your first equipment selection?

parameters.message: Let's try again.  Please select your first equipment.

contents.narration: You selected the {a}, good.  Now, select your second piece of equipment.
You chose the {b}, clever.  Now for your final piece of equipment.

You have selected the {a}, {b}, and {c} for your equipment.  Do remember that you always have a flashlight and a digital camera on you, as well. We will now check your equipment before we proceed.  Your flashlight is on and functioning.  Your camera is operational. All equipment checks out.
Now we begin.
Hmmmmm.
I see, I see.
Alrighty, here is what we know about this location.

There are reports of youthful chatter or laughing about the house.
		||
		Some have heard the voices of children in the night.
		||
		Folklore remembers that terrible things happened to some young people here and many believe they have not forgotten.

There are reports of adult voices echoing through the halls.
		||
		Some say you can hear the chattering of wives and husbands in the night.
		||
		Legend has it that the head mistress or master still claims ownership of the grounds.

Entities here seem to enjoy interacting with the living, almost like its a game to them.
		||
		Reports indicate that the entity is drawn to games like tossing a ball around or moving pieces on a chess board.
		||
		Prior accounts indicate a lighthearted demeanor from the entity.

Those who have encountered the entity describe it as lost or pacing, as if it is looking for something.
		||
		Prior investigations reveal this spirit repeats many of the same actions.
		||
		Reports indicate that the entity seems sad.

Reports indicate that this entity exhibits hatred towards the living.
		||
		Entities have been described as violent and have attacked others or damaged property.
		||
		Previous investigators provide warning that this entity is dangerous.

All accounts indicate the entity as dark with otherworldly malevolence.
		||
		Reports indicate this being will use any means necessary to accomplish its goals.
		||
		One investigator writes that the entity is 'wicked', over and over, maybe a hundred times or more.

Finally, the entity appears to remember or resemble something of its past life.
		||
		Lastly, the entity appears to be dressed in the attire from when it was alive.
		||
		The last report indicates that entities have human features.

Finally, these entities appear to have no prior attachment to a past life.
		||
		Lastly, the entity may appear in monstrous or grosteque forms.
		||
		The last report warns that the entity is completely lacking in any form of humanity.
Time to enter the house.
Welcome back to the hunt. Would you like to pick up where you last left off?
Thanks for playing.
Thanks for playing. Would you like to start over or take a break?
